name: Clare W. McCLELLAN, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, Appellee

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
parties: Clare W. McCLELLAN, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Clare W. McClellan, pro se, McDonald, for appellant.
Michael S. Sherman, Pennsylvania State Police, Harrisburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
632 A.2d 307
Clare W. McCLELLAN, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted March 8, 1993.
Decided Nov. 1, 1993.
Clare W. McClellan, pro se, McDonald, for appellant.
Michael S. Sherman, Pennsylvania State Police, Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
